channel.title: Peekayscape Source+Client Release
channel.description:
I know i may have low post count, but this does not mean i leeched this. I came from another coding community.
Base: Figmentscape V4.5 Creator: Figment
~Credits~ Figment For his server base Austin_(me) for updating it alot Java Got Me Stoned for the client Everyone who posted tutorials and helped me in help section on RS Who's ever chatbox and invatory image i used from there client, not really sure
I quit coding this so i thought i would release it and maybe someone else can finish it off.
NOTE:: There is not a dragon claws special added into it, i was going to add it in until i got bored off of my ass with this source, I have been working on a 508 Client/source for the last week, it will be released in a month or so, once i believe its ready for a v1.
-Things I've Done-
~Server Sided~ Cleaned Out Useless Npcs - Took Awhile, i had to tele to each one to see which they were Delete A Few Useless Commands Cleaned Out Npc handler Cleaned Out Useless Objects in makeglobalobject - Added alot back for my skill area though, took awhile because i had to tele to each one again to see if i needed to delete Custom Train area Make the customs worked server sided Changed melee exp rate from 900 to 400 or so Cleaned out item2.java from unused monsters/drops Removed Dt and put ancient altar at Pkarea
~client Sided~ Cleaned Out Class8.java Added in different Sprites added in new models
These are pictures from my server when it was in advertise section, im too fucking lazy to take new ones..
[IMG]http://i231.photobucket.com/albums/ee3/austin19955/fff-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i231.photobucket.com/albums/ee3/austin19955/ffff-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i231.photobucket.com/albums/ee3/austin19955/ff-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i231.photobucket.com/albums/ee3/austin19955/f-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i231.photobucket.com/albums/ee3/austin19955/ffffff.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i231.photobucket.com/albums/ee3/austin19955/fffffff.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i231.photobucket.com/albums/ee3/austin19955/ffffffff.jpg[/img]
~LINKS~ Client- [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?hjnmmdazuut]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?hjnmmdazuut[/url] Source - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mn2d22jyuzt]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mn2d22jyuzt[/url]
Please Post Feedback, do not try and flame too much.

item.title: Peekayscape Source+Client Release
item.dc:creator: @W1ck3d W1ck3d
item.description:
@W1ck3d wrote:

I know i may have low post count, but this does not mean i leeched this. I came from another coding community.

Base: Figmentscape V4.5
Creator: Figment

~Credits~
Figment For his server base
Austin_(me) for updating it alot
Java Got Me Stoned for the client
Everyone who posted tutorials and helped me in help section on RS
Who’s ever chatbox and invatory image i used from there client, not really sure

I quit coding this so i thought i would release it and maybe someone else can finish it off.

NOTE:: There is not a dragon claws special added into it, i was going to add it in until i got bored off of my ass with this source, I have been working on a 508 Client/source for the last week, it will be released in a month or so, once i believe its ready for a v1.

-Things I’ve Done-

~Server Sided~
Cleaned Out Useless Npcs - Took Awhile, i had to tele to each one to see which they were
Delete A Few Useless Commands
Cleaned Out Npc handler
Cleaned Out Useless Objects in makeglobalobject - Added alot back for my skill area though, took awhile because i had to tele to each one again to see if i needed to delete
Custom Train area
Make the customs worked server sided
Changed melee exp rate from 900 to 400 or so
Cleaned out item2.java from unused monsters/drops
Removed Dt and put ancient altar at Pkarea

~client Sided~
Cleaned Out Class8.java
Added in different Sprites
added in new models

These are pictures from my server when it was in advertise section, im too fucking lazy to take new ones…
